div.class: col-lg-8 bg-white px-3 pt-5 pb-0 shadow-sm

i.class: fa fa-long-arrow-down d-block text-muted mx-3 my-2

div.p: Find out what people see and say about this event, and join the conversation.

div.class: alert alert-info mb-0 d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center

div.em: Tickets for this Event are Sold Out

form.t-if: event.event_registrations_open and (not event.event_ticket_ids or any(not ticket.is_expired for ticket in event.event_ticket_ids))

div.class: d-flex align-items-center py-2 pl-3 pr-2 border-bottom
row px-3 py-3 mx-0 bg-light border-bottom

small.t-if: ticket.end_sale_datetime and ticket.sale_available and not ticket.is_expired
ticket.start_sale_datetime and not ticket.sale_available and not ticket.is_expired

div.class: col-md-4 col-xs-12 p-0 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between

t.t-value: (not ticket.seats_limited or ticket.seats_available > 9) and 10 or ticket.seats_available + 1
(not event.seats_limited or event.seats_available > 9) and 10 or event.seats_available + 1

span.t-if: not ticket.sale_available and not ticket.is_expired and ticket.is_launched()

small.t-if: tickets.end_sale_datetime and tickets.sale_available and not tickets.is_expired

t.t-value: (not tickets or not tickets.seats_limited or tickets.seats_available > 9) and 10 or tickets.seats_available + 1
(not event.seats_limited or event.seats_available > 9) and 10 or event.seats_available + 1
min(seats_max_ticket, seats_max_event) if tickets else seats_max_event

div.strong: You ordered more tickets than available seats
